modName: Diable - Friend and follower by Setvi and Rual - Skyrim
summary:
Add a follower based on a fictional character who's appear on a short novel made by my best friend, Rual Ilotreb!
This short story was occasionally tell by Rual during evening!
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4][center][b][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67121/?]Aldmeri Dominion Armory of Setvi - Armurerie du Domaine Aldmeri de Setvi - Skyrim by Setvi[/url][/size][/b]

Description:
Add a follower based on a fictional character who's appear on a short novel made by my best friend, Rual Ilotreb!
This short story was occasionally tell by Rual during evening!

Name:
Diable.

Race:
Nord.

Armor:
Ebony.

Weapon:
Ebony.
2-Hand.

Location:
Winterhold's Inn.

Character creation date:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]DD-MM-YYYY[/size][/color][/b]12-07-2015

By:
Me (Setvi) and by/with Rual Ilotreb.

Unique.
Essential.
Oblivion.

Author's notes:
Today, it's the birthday of my big and best friend Rual! Make this (virtual) day so big, with Diable, please! It's a surprise! Make it happen!
FOR RUAL!

The hood on the screenshot come from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69651?]Impoverished Rogue - outfits for Bards and Mages by Tinuvia[/url]'s mod and are not included!
It's just to promote this so amazing mod!
Give it a try!
Screenshots are welcome!

DLC &
Required:
Nothing.

Credits &
List of mods used in the screenshots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/?]Shadows by HHaleyy[/url]
[b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7587/?]Height Adjusted Races with True Giants by EvilDeadAsh34 (FILES - MAIN FILES - Height Adjusted Races - Morrowind Lore Heights)
[/url][/size][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69651?]Impoverished Rogue - outfits for Bards and Mages by Tinuvia
[/url]Nikkinoodles and Caliente
Give it a try!
Thx!
Setvi for Rual[/center][/size][/color][/b]
